message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start!
I understand you want a larger share, but that's a bit too much for me. How about a bit closer to the middle?
I see we're getting closer, let's meet in the middle of our previous offers.
This is a very fair offer considering the time pressure and inflation working against you. Let's close the deal!
I know inflation is against me, but I still think I deserve a bit more than your last offer.
Time is running out, Alice. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
